pr_title: Accessibility: Add alt tags where they are missing

timeline.message: Add alt tag to the logo
If the alt tag is empty, use the source instead in the ImageRenderer

timeline.bodyText: No need for new // $NON-NLS-1$ comments.  In fact, can you please bulk delete them when you see them?  :)
timeline.author: abidingotter
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -100,9 +100,13 @@ protected void prepareFirstAttributes(SectionWriter writer, Map<String, String>
     attrs.put("src", source); // $NON-NLS-1$
     attrs.put("width", width); // $NON-NLS-1$
     attrs.put("height", height); // $NON-NLS-1$
-    if (alt != null) {
+    if (alt != null && alt.getText().length() > 0) {
       attrs.put("alt", alt.getText()); // $NON-NLS-1$
       attrs.put("title", alt.getText()); // $NON-NLS-1$
+    } else {
+      // If the alt tag is not set, just use the source as the alt
+      attrs.put("alt", source); // $NON-NLS-1$

timeline.bodyText: Just an FYI, the original intention of ImageRenderer was that alt was never optional.  (See the comment on the constructor :) )  This change seems fine however.
timeline.author: abidingotter
